purpose: The email announces two full-time, permanent lecturer/senior lecturer positions available at Massey University in New Zealand, specifically within the School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences. The university is looking for candidates with expertise in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction. The roles involve teaching and supervising students at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels, as well as leading research initiatives and seeking external funding. Interested applicants can find more details and application instructions through the provided link.

evidence_sentences: The School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences at Massey University is seeking *two full-time, permanent* academic staff members to join the Computer Science and Information Technology group, based at our Albany Campus, Auckland.
We are interested in candidates with a research focus in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction.
In this role, youâ€™ll provide high-quality teaching and supervision at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, both in-person and online.
You will also lead and contribute to an active research programme, including the supervision of Master's and PhD students, and pursue external research funding opportunities.

More information about the postion, including details on how to apply, can be found here: https://masseyunicareers.nga.net.nz/cp/index.cfm?event=jobs.checkJobDetailsNewApplication&returnToEvent=jobs.listJobs&jobid=C28B71DC-E87D-C4D2-DA96-E3ECC8834915&CurATC=EXT&CurBID=62AFB35D%2D9273%2D4A11%2D8DCC%2D9DB401354197&JobListID=22FC4F47%2DE994%2D46A3%2DB8C9%2D9BC901269F43&jobsListKey=37959d9a%2D77a2%2D45c6%2Da2aa%2D9eea6cbb8464&persistVariables=CurATC,CurBID,JobListID,jobsListKey,JobID&lid=39906670120&rmuh=7E4712B214DF233A12700BB7E34A99F32F4ADE7D
Further enquiries should be directed to: Professor Hans Guesgen, School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences, Massey University.
